data.name: Mushrooms: Forest Walker
data.detailed_description:
Cowgirl - fourth multiplayer character



COWGIRL - fourth character for Mushrooms: Forest Walker survival multiplayer game about mushrooms and other kind of stuff :)

Add to Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/769100/Mushrooms_Forest_Walker/


Redneck - third multiplayer character



Redneck - third playable character for Multiplayer Mode in Mushrooms: Forest Walker

Add to Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/769100/Mushrooms_Forest_Walker/


Guy - second multiplayer character



Guy - second playable character for Multiplayer Mode in Mushrooms: Forest Walker

Add to Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/769100/Mushrooms_Forest_Walker/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l9QFMdSMVKA


Guy - second multiplayer playable character



We are preparing new characters for the Mushrooms: Forest Walker Multiplayer mode.

The second model after texturing - GUY.

Add to Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/769100/Mushrooms_Forest_Walker/

Soon more information about access to the demo, new characters and multiplayer mode.


Guy - second multiplayer playable character



We are preparing new characters for the Mushrooms: Forest Walker Multiplayer mode.

The second model before texturing - GUY.

Add to Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/769100/Mushrooms_Forest_Walker

Soon more information about access to the demo, new characters and multiplayer mode.


Baba - first multiplayer playable character



Baba - first playable Hero for Multiplayer in Mushrooms: Forest Walker

Add to Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/769100/Mushrooms_Forest_Walker/

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4q9aTTrGg-k&feature=youtu.be


Mushrooms: Forest Walker - Multiplayer



We are preparing new characters for the Mushrooms: Forest Walker​ Multiplayer mode.

The first model after texturing - BABA.

Soon more information about access to the demo, new characters and multiplayer mode.


Mushrooms: Forest Walker - Multiplayer



We are preparing new characters for the Mushrooms: Forest Walker​ Multiplayer mode.

The first model before texturing - BABA.

Soon more information about access to the demo, new characters and multiplayer mode.


Mushrooms: Forest Walker Demo - First Movie from Gameplay



Portal Nordrheintv PLAY published first movie with gamplay from Mushrooms: Forest Walker Demo.

https://youtu.be/jduzUf1mxP8


Main Game Features



MAIN GAME FEATURES:
- Mushroom Picker Simulator
- Over 100 different kinds of mushrooms
- Edible, not edible, with special properties and magic shrooms
- Five different worlds with unique flora: North America (Blair Forest), Asia (Aokigahara Forest), Europe (Babayaga Forest), South America (Machu Picchu Forest), Africa (Babylon Forest)
- Over 250 different tasks and puzzles using: crafting, cooking, trading and survival skills
- Over 30 unique characters, f.e.: Jacob the Walker, Black Witch from Blair, Suicide Forest Keeper, Fire Walker from Twin Hills, and more...
- Multiplayer - individual and co-op challenges with Special Mushroom Battle Royale scenario
- Achievements, Cards, Leaderboards
- Mushrooms encyclopedia (Mushroom Book) with description of all kind of mushrooms - over 500 pages
- Special mobile app to scan mushrooms with additional information


About the Game



Mushrooms: Forest Walker is a Mushroom Picker Simulator.

In the game we will be able to pick, recognize, trade and use mushrooms to prepare meals, elixirs and special mixtures.

We will be able to travel in five different worlds: North America, Asia, South America, Europe and Africa.

Each world contains specific and unique kind of mushrooms and stories.

We can find edible and not edible mushrooms, but also special shrooms with unique properties which can be used as ingredients to healing and making special effects mixtures.

During our walk in the forests we'll find special characters and individuals which are looking for rare shrooms - you will be able to help in their search and receive special recipies and items.

Forests are a danger area, so you should watch out and use all your skills and knowledge for survival in hard diffcult conditions.

Crafting, cooking, survival skills will be very valuable.

If you don't like to walk in forest alone, you will be able to travel with your friends in multiplayer mode. There will be special challenges for individual and cooperation modes.

So start your adventure in Mushrooms: Forest Walker and find very rare magic shrooms.

MAIN GAME FEATURES:
- Mushroom Picker Simulator
- Over 100 different kinds of mushrooms
- Edible, not edible, with special properties and magic shrooms
- Five different worlds with unique flora: North America (Blair Forest), Asia (Aokigahara Forest), Europe (Babayaga Forest), South America (Machu Picchu Forest), Africa (Babylon Forest)
- Over 250 different tasks and puzzles using: crafting, cooking, trading and survival skills
- Over 30 unique characters, f.e.: Jacob the Walker, Black Witch from Blair, Suicide Forest Keeper, Fire Walker from Twin Hills, and more...
- Multiplayer - individual and co-op challenges with Special Mushroom Battle Royale scenario
- Achievements, Cards, Leaderboards
- Mushrooms encyclopedia (Mushroom Book) with description of all kind of mushrooms - over 500 pages
- Special mobile app to scan mushrooms with additional information

data.short_description: Mushrooms: Forest Walker is a Mushroom Picker Simulator. In the game we will be able to pick, recognize, trade and use mushrooms to prepare meals, elixirs and special mixtures. We will be able to travel in five different worlds: North America, Asia, South America, Europe and Australia.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
